Chrome: Google Chrome is a freeware web browser developed by Google LLC. It was first released on September 2, 2008.
Firefox: Mozilla Firefox is a free and open-source web browser developed by Mozilla Foundation and its subsidiary,
Safari: Safari is a graphical web browser developed by Apple, based on the WebKit engine. First released on desktop in 2003 with Mac OS X Panther.
Edge: Microsoft Edge is a graphical web browser developed by Microsoft and included in Windows 10, Windows 10 Mobile and Xbox One devices.
